additionalFields.frontDescription: Easily run and manage containers on any customer-managed infrastructure

additionalFields.backDescription:
• Migrate an unlimited number of servers at no charge (for up to 90 days per server).
  • Migrate applications to the cloud without changes and with minimal downtime.
  • Automatically convert source servers from physical, virtual, or cloud infrastructure to run natively on AWS.
  • Use same automated process for a wide range of applications.
additionalFields.frontCtaText: Learn more about AWS Application Migration Service

additionalFields.frontDescription: Simplify and expedite migrations while reducing cost.

additionalFields.backDescription: Unlimited pre-migration assessment requests to simplify discovery, project cloud costs and accelerate migration decisions.
additionalFields.frontDescription: Migration Evaluator helps customers rapidly see projected costs of running their on-premises estate in AWS.
